title: Does He Deserve A  Ban?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
i want playing eve for then 1st time in a year and a guy that sometimes
 plays on here with me knew that an this is wot he said to me after this game

[10:12AM] Him: get on skype lol 
[10:13AM] Me: ok
[10:16AM] Him: getting on ?
[2:19PM] Me: wots taking so long?
[2:20PM] Him: everyonex is getting lunch
nearly done
[2:21PM] Me: kk
[3:23PM] : game?
[3:23PM] Him: gotta do dishes ill be 5
[3:23PM] Me: ok
[3:35PM] Him: accept
poi 
game
game
game
game
game
game
game
game
[3:36PM] Me: ok
(this is after the game)
[4:06PM] Him: worst league player in the group kill ur slef get a job loser and stop being a lazy %%%%
[4:06PM] Me: k then..

and then he ether blocked or unfriended me but i'd just like players like him not
 to be on league as much as possible

replies.body:
dont worry, that type of toxicity usually isn't isolated so it probably won't be long before he gets punished in some way.

also inb4 the mod squad, remove the name
